fif_learning

Class FilterUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • fif_learning.FilterUpdate

  • public abstract class FilterUpdate
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides several functionalities for the correct update of a filter.
    Author:
    Nicola Gazzilli, Gianmarco Divittorio

      • checkAttribute

        public static boolean checkAttribute(Descriptor d,
                                     DescriptionBasedFilter f)
        Checks for the Attribute related to a Description Based Filter to be contained in a Descriptor.
        Parameters:
        d - - the descriptor to check
        f - - the filter from which the attribute is fetched
        Returns:
        true if the attribute is in descriptor, false otherwise

      • updater

        public static Filter updater(ResourceRegister rr,
                             Filter f)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        If the filtering grade between a resource and a filter doesn't surpass a specific input-defined threshold, the filter is then put in a Parallel Filter along with the filter created using the resource, during the update phase. Otherwise, the filter is updated as usual.
        Parameters:
        rr -
        r -
        f -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
